name: Edge Of Hell
description:
Welcome to the EDGE OF HELL!

Your only objectives, kill everything that moves, brutally!

GAME IS A PREVIEW OF WHAT IS TO COME! PLEASE FOLLOW FOR UPDATES. MUSIC IS TAKEN FROM AUDIO JUNGLE. MORE ENVIRONMENTS ARE PLANNED USING CUSTOM ASSETS. GAME uses SIMPLE APOCALYPSE on Unity Asset Store. Currently raising funds!

AS OF NOW ONLY EASY MODE WORKS!

How to Play
- WASD to move!
- Use mouse to look around.
- After picking up a weapon, use the left mouse button to shoot.
- Press R to reload
- Adjust Graphical settings in the launcher.
- Kill all enemies to end level.

READ THIS PLEASE
- Game only has 2 levels, and is a preview of what is to come.
- The environments are not final! After raising funds, we will have custom made assets and environments. The character models may or may not be the same.
- Only 2 types of enemies are currently in the game.
- At least 50 levels for this game are planned.
- Dismemberment system, blood and gore system to be added.
- Brutality elements will be added into the game.
- A variety of different enemy types are planned.
